title: Discord Bot
description: Haɗa wallet ɗinka don buɗe abubuwan da bot ya kunsa
pageDescription: Kunna PeckyBot a Discord don samun sanarwar bid na NFT da aka Samu, dakuma faɗakarwar a kasuwar Crystara. Zaka Biya 5,000 $SUPRA sau ɗaya, daga baya kuma ka ci gaba da Biya da Pecky tokens.
heading: PECKYBOT a Discord
feature1: Samun sanarwa idan wani ya yi bid a NFT ɗinka
feature2: Saita sanarwa ga manyan NFTs 25 a Crystara ƙasa da farashin da ka zaɓa
gasText: Bayan haka, Pecky kawai ake buƙata a matsayin gas don bot ya ci gaba da aiki.
burnNotice: Dukkan $Pecky da aka yi amfani da su a bot za a ƙone su.
extendButton: Kara yawan kwanakin bot dinka da Pecky
keepExtending: Bot zai ci gaba da aiki muddin kana Kara yawan kwanakin!
needHelp: Kana buƙatar taimako? Tambaya a Discord!
connectWalletFirst: Da fatan ka haɗa wallet ɗinka da farko
enterValidDays: Da fatan ka saka adadin kwanakin Daya dace
extensionFailed: An kasa tsawaita/ Kara kwanakin bot: {error}
